title: How trauma causes inflammation & how to begin healing + orthorexia signs & solutions, & how to heal adrenal fatigue with Dr. Will Cole
description:
***Pre-order my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com/

Register for my 2020 Virtual Mental Health Solutions Summit: https://www.drleafconference.com

Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips. Just text DRLEAF to 1 (833) 285 3747


In Western thought, we see mental and physical health as two separate things, but this is not the case. Our thoughts and emotions, choice, life events, trauma and so on affect both our mental AND physical wellbeing. In this podcast I speak with leading functional medicine practitioner Dr. Will Cole about this mind-body connection, ways to reduce stress-induced inflammation, what adaptogens we should be taking to strengthen the mind and body, the best supplements for brain health, how to recognize and heal orthorexia, and more!  

Read the show blog here:  https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/how-trauma-causes-inflammation-how-to-begin-healing-orthorexia-signs-solutions-with-leading-functional-medicine-doctor-dr-will-cole

Dr. Cole's website: https://drwillcole.com/

Podcast Highlights

2:45 How stressing about COVID can cause inflammation & impact our wellbeing

5:00 Why racism is a toxic thought & how it affects our health

8:05 The relationship between trauma, inflammation & illness

13:40 What is adrenal fatigue & how does it affect us?

14:40 How what we eat can affect our inflammation levels & ability to cope with stress

21:00 What are adaptogens & why are they so good for us?

29:09 Key natural supplements that can improve our health & wellbeing

41:56 How do we ensure that we are getting good quality products & are not just buying an expensive health fad?

45:27 What is orthorexia & how can we overcome it?

52:02 Key wellness tips from leading experts
